messages.messageBody:
Deb Lewis wrote:

> So, for any newbies (and there seems to be a lot of new folks) don't sweat
> over intro's if they're not your thing. Join in and we'll get to know you
> by your contributions. (or lurk, that's ok too.)

Ok, thanks. I was just befuddled over whether anyone had seen any of my
contributions to the list, and had wanted to erm, nicely, say it without
projecting the appearance of a whiner ;-)

Thank you all for the welcome :-)

messages.subject: Those fleeting introductions was Re: Intro
messages.msgSnippet: ***I posted my intro 2x before, *** Intro s are nice but their not necessary. : ) Yahoo says this list has 1329 members now.  That s a lot of people but only a
messages.messageBody:
***I posted my intro 2x before, ***

Intro's are nice but their not necessary. : )
Yahoo says this list has 1329 members now. That's a lot of people but only
a small percentage of people post regularly. Maybe most people have a
better brain than I do but I don't remember people by their introductions.
I remember after they've posted a few times and I've seen their names and
gotten a feel for their writing style.

So, for any newbies (and there seems to be a lot of new folks) don't sweat
over intro's if they're not your thing. Join in and we'll get to know you
by your contributions. (or lurk, that's ok too.)


Deb Lewis
